response.original_title: The Man with the Golden Gun
response.overview: Cool government operative James Bond searches for a stolen invention that can turn the sun's heat into a destructive weapon. He soon crosses paths with the menacing Francisco Scaramanga, a hitman so skilled he has a seven-figure working fee. Bond then joins forces with the swimsuit-clad Mary Goodnight, and together they track Scaramanga to a Thai tropical isle hideout where the killer-for-hire lures the slick spy into a deadly maze for a final duel.
response.tagline: The world's greatest villains tried to kill James Bond...now it's Scaramanga's turn to try!
response.title: The Man with the Golden Gun
